ResearchProjectDef.label: AT44
ResearchProjectDef.description:
A volatile relic from Old Earth’s Second World War, the AT-44 was Fedorov’s failed attempt to harness the 7.62×39mm cartridge. Too fragile for its time, the design was abandoned until salvaged schematics were recovered from a crashed freighter.
Rebuilt with modern alloys, it is now a heavy, rhythmic beast. Though difficult to control, its raw stopping power is undeniable.
A failed experiment resurrected to dominate the future.
~wololooo
